Articles.Content:
Attachments used to be on (2011ish), but they got turned off and all attachments were deleted? Why?

Also, why do all posts before 2012 that have an apostrophe look like this:

Can't (supposed to be can't)
Turned out there was a security risk somewhere in the system, and so they will remain disabled on this forum. Sorry.

Part of the issue (back then, at least) was that following the move to vBulletin, there was a lot less server space available to host attachments.

But yeah, vB doesn't handle them securely enough, so they're going to remain disabled.
